metadata.name: Basic User Persona
metadata.description: A simple persona template with demographics, goals, pain points, and behaviors
metadata.author: System

fields.name: name
fields.description: The persona's name (e.g., 'Sarah the Busy Designer')

fields.name: tagline
fields.description: One-sentence summary of who this persona is
examples: A freelance designer who values speed over complexity

fields.name: goals
fields.description: What this persona is trying to achieve

items.name: goal
examples: Ship designs quickly without compromising quality

fields.name: painPoints
fields.description: Challenges and frustrations this persona faces

fields.name: behaviors
fields.description: Observable patterns in how this persona works

fields.name: quote
fields.description: A representative quote that captures this persona's mindset
examples: I don't have time to learn every feature - I just need to get things done

aiGuidance.systemPrompt: When creating this persona, focus on real patterns from the interview data. Each field should be backed by evidence. Keep goals, pain points, and behaviors concise (1-2 sentences each).
